parameters.jsCode:
// V-OMEGA Initialization from Year 3025
const uuid = () => crypto.randomUUID ? crypto.randomUUID() : Array.from({length:36},(_,i)=>[8,13,18,23].includes(i)?'-':(Math.random()*16|0).toString(16)).join('');
const nowIso = new Date().toISOString();

// Alien Intelligence Parameters
const alienConfig = {
  request_id: uuid(),
  timestamp: nowIso,
  viral_threshold: 97.3,
  galaxy_target: '5_BILLION_VIEWS',
  crystal_lion_mode: 'ROARING',
  glass_transformation: 'QUANTUM',
  vsmr_frequency: 432,
  consciousness_expansion: 'MAXIMUM',
  alien_tech_level: 'YEAR_3025',
  
  // 22 Avatar Profiles for Maximum Personalization
  avatar_profiles: [
    { id: 'lina_001', name: 'Lina', role: 'VSMR Coach', specialty: 'Angstabbau & Freiheit', voice: '2d3e3a3fce4f40a598086c0ff61863d7', emotion: 'calming' },
    { id: 'mathias_002', name: 'Mathias', role: 'Success Mentor', specialty: 'Traumauto & Motivation', voice: 'mathias_voice_id', emotion: 'enthusiastic' },
    { id: 'crystal_lion_003', name: 'Crystal-LÃ¶we', role: 'Galaxy Commander', specialty: 'Team Building & Passive Income', voice: 'crystal_roar_voice', emotion: 'powerful' },
    { id: 'freedom_guide_004', name: 'Freedom Guide', role: 'Lifestyle Coach', specialty: 'Finanzielle Freiheit', voice: 'freedom_voice_id', emotion: 'inspiring' },
    { id: 'wealth_master_005', name: 'Wealth Master', role: 'Money Magnet', specialty: 'Reichtum & Abundance', voice: 'wealth_voice_id', emotion: 'confident' },
    { id: 'team_builder_006', name: 'Team Builder', role: 'Community Leader', specialty: 'Network Growth', voice: 'team_voice_id', emotion: 'motivating' },
    { id: 'car_expert_007', name: 'Car Expert', role: 'Luxury Advisor', specialty: 'Traumautos ab 99â‚¬', voice: 'car_voice_id', emotion: 'exciting' },
    { id: 'success_story_008', name: 'Success Story', role: 'Testimonial', specialty: 'Real Results', voice: 'success_voice_id', emotion: 'authentic' },
    { id: 'vision_creator_009', name: 'Vision Creator', role: 'Dream Architect', specialty: 'Zukunftsvisionen', voice: 'vision_voice_id', emotion: 'visionary' },
    { id: 'fear_destroyer_010', name: 'Fear Destroyer', role: 'Confidence Builder', specialty: 'Mut & Selbstvertrauen', voice: 'courage_voice_id', emotion: 'empowering' },
    { id: 'time_freedom_011', name: 'Time Freedom', role: 'Lifestyle Designer', specialty: 'Zeitfreiheit', voice: 'time_voice_id', emotion: 'relaxed' },
    { id: 'bonus_hunter_012', name: 'Bonus Hunter', role: 'Reward Specialist', specialty: 'Fast Track Bonus', voice: 'bonus_voice_id', emotion: 'excited' },
    { id: 'glass_transformer_013', name: 'Glass Transformer', role: 'Reality Shifter', specialty: 'Glas-DNA Mutation', voice: 'glass_voice_id', emotion: 'mystical' },
    { id: 'quantum_coach_014', name: 'Quantum Coach', role: 'Dimension Guide', specialty: 'Quantum Leap Success', voice: 'quantum_voice_id', emotion: 'otherworldly' },
    { id: 'hologram_master_015', name: 'Hologram Master', role: '3D Specialist', specialty: 'Begehbare Welten', voice: 'hologram_voice_id', emotion: 'futuristic' },
    { id: 'vsmr_hypnotist_016', name: 'VSMR Hypnotist', role: 'Consciousness Expander', specialty: '432Hz Bewusstsein', voice: 'vsmr_voice_id', emotion: 'hypnotic' },
    { id: 'crystal_healer_017', name: 'Crystal Healer', role: 'Energy Worker', specialty: 'Kristall-Energie', voice: 'crystal_voice_id', emotion: 'healing' },
    { id: 'portal_opener_018', name: 'Portal Opener', role: 'Gateway Guardian', specialty: 'Dimensionsportale', voice: 'portal_voice_id', emotion: 'magical' },
    { id: 'wealth_frequency_019', name: 'Wealth Frequency', role: 'Abundance Tuner', specialty: '528Hz Reichtum', voice: 'frequency_voice_id', emotion: 'abundant' },
    { id: 'team_multiplier_020', name: 'Team Multiplier', role: 'Growth Accelerator', specialty: 'Exponentielles Wachstum', voice: 'multiplier_voice_id', emotion: 'explosive' },
    { id: 'dream_materializer_021', name: 'Dream Materializer', role: 'Manifestation Expert', specialty: 'TrÃ¤ume werden RealitÃ¤t', voice: 'dream_voice_id', emotion: 'manifestive' },
    { id: 'galaxy_emperor_022', name: 'Galaxy Emperor', role: 'Universal Ruler', specialty: 'Galaktische Herrschaft', voice: 'emperor_voice_id', emotion: 'commanding' }
  ],
  
  // 8 Holographic Backgrounds
  holographic_backgrounds: [
    'Crystal Palace with floating luxury cars',
    'Glass DNA laboratory with quantum particles',
    'VSMR meditation chamber with 432Hz visualization',
    'Luxury car showroom in space station',
    '3D hologram meeting room with team avatars',
    'Money tree forest with diamond fruits',
    'Portal gateway to financial freedom dimension',
    'Galaxy command center with success metrics'

};

// Dynamic Prompts from the Future
const dynamicPrompts = [
  'Crystal-LÃ¶we explodiert aus 4D-Hologramm - Traumauto ab 99â‚¬ materialisiert sich',
  'Glas-DNA verwandelt RealitÃ¤t - Passives Einkommen flieÃŸt wie flÃ¼ssiger Diamant',
  'VSMR-Hypnose: WÃ¤hrend du schlÃ¤fst, baut sich dein Team auf',
  'Begehbare 3D-Welt: Crystal-LÃ¶we fÃ¼hrt durch deine Zukunft',
  'Quantum-Loop: Endlos-Content generiert sich selbst',
  'Hologramm-Meeting: Dein Team wartet in der 5. Dimension',
  'Glas-Portal Ã¶ffnet sich: 10.000â‚¬ passives Einkommen wartet',
  'Crystal-LÃ¶we brÃ¼llt: Galaxy-Eroberung beginnt JETZT!'
];

return {
  config: alienConfig,
  prompts: dynamicPrompts,
  control: {
    max_retries: 3,
    backoff_ms: [1000, 3000, 9000],
    viral_threshold: 97.3
  }
};

{
